name: BarkBox, Inc.
description: Provider of subscription based platform designed to supply treat boxes for dogs. The company's treat boxes are themed boxes which includes innovative toys, all-natural treats and chews, enabling dog owners to give best treats to their dogs.
one_liner: Provider of subscription based platform designed to supply treat boxes for dogs. The company's treat boxes are themed boxes which includes innovative toys, all-natural treats and chews, enabling dog owners to give best treats to their dogs.
